original_text: For the man on whom this sign of healing was performed was more than forty years old.
korean_text: 이 표적으로 병 나은 사람은 사십여 세나 되었더라

sentences.original_text: For this sign of healing was performed on a man
sentences.korean_translation: 이 치유의 표적은 한 사람에게 행해졌습니다

sentences.original_text: The man was more than forty years old
